mapper.select: select file_num, team_num, file_uploader, ui.user_nn, file_originalfilename, file_renamefilename, file_reg_date from tb_file f left join user_info ui on (f.file_uploader = ui.user_no) where team_num = #{ team_num } and file_num > 0 order by file_reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_file (file_num, team_num, file_uploader, file_originalfilename, file_renamefilename, file_reg_date) values ((select max(file_num) + 1 from tb_file), #{ team_num }, #{ file_uploader }, #{ file_originalfilename }, #{ file_renamefilename }, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from tb_file where file_num = #{ file_num }
mapper.delete: delete from tb_file where file_num = #{ file_num }
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, file_num, team_num, file_uploader, ui.user_nn, file_originalfilename, file_renamefilename, file_reg_date from tb_file f left join user_info ui on (f.file_uploader = ui.user_no) where team_num = #{ team_num } and file_num > 0 order by file_reg_date desc) where rownum between 1 and 10
